title: The Vampire Omnibus
description: The list of great vampire movies made since the turn of the century is almost endless. In this collection, Peter Haining, has brought together not only the earliest and rarest vampire tales, but also the short stories on which many of the great films of this genre are based; as well as a wide-ranging selection of contributions by some of the great modern masters of horror: Stephen King, Anne Rice, Ray Bradbury, William F. Nolan and Richard Laymon ...
author: Peter Haining
